text: Then Jesus said to him the third time, “Simon, son of 21:17 Jonah ¦ John CTJonah, do yoʋ care for me?” Peter was grieved that Jesus said to him the third time, “Do yoʋ care for me?” And he said to him, “Lord, yoʋ know everything; yoʋ know that I care for yoʋ.” Jesus said to him, “Feed my 21:17 sheep ¦ little sheep WHsheep.
